description: A square temple in a temenos located behind the the theatre in Verulamium Roman town. Lewis (1966) suggest a chronology beginning around the year 90 and and end date in the mid 5th CE after several phases of rebuilding and additions.
bibliography: Frere, S., (1960), Excavations at Verulamium 1959. Fifth Interim Report, Antiquaries Journal, 40, pg. 12 ff
Lowther, A., (1937), Report on Excavations at Verulamium in 1934, Antiquaries Journal, 17, pg. 28 ff
Wheeler, R., Wheeler, T., (1936), in Verulamium, A Belgic and two Roman Cities, pg. 113 ff
